root.description: OverviewChimeras: Tune of Revenge is a hidden objects game published by Big Fish Games for the PC and Mac platforms.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8CPU: 2.5 GHzRAM: 1024 MBDirectX: 9.0Hard Drive: 1013 MBMacOS: 10.8/10.7/10.6/10.5CPU: 2.5 GHz (Intel Only)RAM: 1024 MBHard Drive: 986 MB
